Post.title: theme-install
Post._content:
## ** Hexo 5.0.0 ** [Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/) Hexo [](https://codeload.github.com/blinkfox/hexo-theme-matery/zip/master) `master` `hexo-theme-matery` Hexo `themes` `themes` `git clone` : ```bash git clone https://github.com/blinkfox/hexo-theme-matery.git ``` ## (_config.yml_config.yml) ### Hexo `_config.yml` `theme` `theme: hexo-theme-matery` #### `_config.yml` : - `_config.yml` `url` `URL``http://lqs-1.github.io` - `_config.yml` `per_page` `6` `12``18` - `_config.yml` `language` `zh-CN` ### categories `categories` `source` `categories/index.md` ```bash hexo new page "categories" ``` `/source/categories/index.md` ```yaml --- title: categories date: 2018-09-30 17:25:30 type: "categories" layout: "categories" --- ``` ### tags `tags` `source` `tags/index.md` ```bash hexo new page "tags" ``` `/source/tags/index.md` ```yaml --- title: tags date: 2018-09-30 18:23:38 type: "tags" layout: "tags" --- ``` ### 404 `source` `404.md` ```bash touch 404.md ``` `/source/404/index.md` ```yaml --- title: 404 date: 2018-09-30 17:25:30 type: "404" layout: "404" description: "Oops :(" --- ``` ### #### urlicon. 1.(`Index```) 2.icon [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com/icons) ```yaml menu: Index: url: / icon: fas fa-home Tags: url: /tags icon: fas fa-tags Categories: url: /categories icon: fas fa-bookmark Archives: url: /archives icon: fas fa-archive ``` #### 1. `children`(:`About``children`) 2. `children` name,urlicon. 3. `-`. 4. ```yaml menu: Index: url: / icon: fas fa-home Tags: url: /tags icon: fas fa-tags Categories: url: /categories icon: fas fa-bookmark Archives: url: /archives icon: fas fa-archive About: url: /about icon: fas fa-user-circle-o Friends: url: /friends icon: fas fa-address-book Medias: icon: fas fa-list children: - name: Music url: /music icon: fas fa-music - name: Movies url: /movies icon: fas fa-film - name: Books url: /books icon: fas fa-book - name: Galleries url: /galleries icon: fas fa-image ``` `hexo clean && hexo g` `emoji` ### Hexo5.0 `prismjs` `hexo-prism-plugin` `npm uninstall hexo-prism-plugin` `{` `}` Hexo `_config.yml` `highlight.enable` `false` `prismjs.enable` `true` ```yaml highlight: enable: false line_number: true auto_detect: false tab_replace: '' wrap: true hljs: false prismjs: enable: true preprocess: true line_number: true tab_replace: '' ``` `prismjs` `Tomorrow Night` [prismjs ](https://prismjs.com/download.html) `css` css `prism.css` `hexo-theme-matery` `source/libs/prism/prism.css` ### [hexo-generator-search](https://github.com/wzpan/hexo-generator-search) Hexo ```bash npm install hexo-generator-search --save ``` Hexo `_config.yml` ```yaml search: path: search.xml field: post ``` ### Hexo `SEO` `gitment` [hexo-permalink-pinyin](https://github.com/viko16/hexo-permalink-pinyin) Hexo ```bash npm i hexo-permalink-pinyin --save ``` Hexo `_config.yml` ```yaml permalink_pinyin: enable: true separator: '-' # default: '-' ``` > ****[hexo-abbrlink](https://github.com/rozbo/hexo-abbrlink) ### [hexo-wordcount](https://github.com/willin/hexo-wordcount) ```bash npm i --save hexo-wordcount ``` `_config.yml` ```yaml postInfo: date: true update: false wordCount: false # true. totalCount: false # true. min2read: false # . readCount: false # . ``` ### `_config.yml` `QQ``GitHub` ### BGM ```yaml
``` ### `source/medias/reward` ## Front-matter ### Front-matter `Front-matter` **** `title` `date` | | | | | ---------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | | title | `Markdown` | | | date | | | | author | `_config.yml` `author` | | | img | `featureImages` | ().: `http://xxx.com/xxx.jpg` | | top | `true` | `top` `true` | | cover | `false` | `v1.0.2` | | coverImg | | `v1.0.2` | | password | | `password` `SHA256` `config.yml` `verifyPassword` | | toc | `true` | TOC TOC `config.yml` `toc` | | mathjax | `false` | `mathjax` `_config.yml` | | summary | | | | categories | | | | tags | | | | keywords | | SEO | | reprintPolicy | cc_by | cc_by, cc_by_nd, cc_by_sa, cc_by_nc, cc_by_nc_nd, cc_by_nc_sa, cc0, noreprint pay | > ****: > 1. `img` `hashcode` **** > 2. `date` `Gitalk` `Gitment` `id` `date` > 3. Front-matter SHA256 password `_config.yml` SHA256 [](http://tool.oschina.net/encrypt?type=2)[chahuo](http://encode.chahuo.com/)[](http://tool.chinaz.com/tools/hash.aspx) > 4. md front-matter reprintPolicy `Front-matter` ### ```yaml --- title: typora-vue-theme date: 2018-09-07 09:25:00 --- ``` ### ```yaml --- title: typora-vue-theme date: 2018-09-07 09:25:00 author: img: /source/images/xxx.jpg top: true cover: true coverImg: /images/1.jpg password: 8d969eef6ecad3c29a3a629280e686cf0c3f5d5a86aff3ca12020c923adc6c92 toc: false mathjax: false summary: categories: Markdown tags: - Typora - Markdown --- ``` ## ![](http://static.blinkfox.com/matery-20181202-1.png) ![](http://static.blinkfox.com/matery-20181202-2.png) ![](http://static.blinkfox.com/matery-20181202-3.png) ![](http://static.blinkfox.com/matery-20181202-7.png) ![](http://static.blinkfox.com/matery-20181202-8.png) ## `_config.yml` - - - - - `favicon` `Logo` - - TOC - - - MathJax - - '' - - - - `Gitalk``Gitment``Valine` `disqus` - [](http://busuanzi.ibruce.info/)`Google Analytics` - `hashcode` **** `_config.yml` ### `/source/css/matery.css` `.bg-color` ```css /* . */ .bg-color { background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #4cbf30 0%, #0f9d58 100%); } @-webkit-keyframes rainbow { /* . */ } @keyframes rainbow { /* . */ } ``` ### banner `/source/medias/banner` `banner` `7` `JavaScript` `banner` `/layout/_partial/bg-cover-content.ejs` `` ```javascript $('.bg-cover').css('background-image', 'url(/medias/banner/' + new Date().getDay() + '.jpg)'); ``` `/source/medias/featureimages` 24 `_config.yml`
Post.raw:
--- title: theme-install top: true cover: false toc: true mathjax: true date: 2023-01-15 17:09:28 password: summary: hexo+github+cheme tags: cheme categories: ---

Front-matter SHA256 password `_config.yml` SHA256 [](http://tool.oschina.net/encrypt?type=2)[chahuo](http://encode.chahuo.com/)[](http://tool.chinaz.com/tools/hash.aspx) > 4. md front-matter reprintPolicy `Front-matter` ### ```yaml --- title: typora-vue-theme date: 2018-09-07 09:25:00 --- ``` ### ```yaml --- title: typora-vue-theme date: 2018-09-07 09:25:00 author: img: /source/images/xxx.jpg top: true cover: true coverImg: /images/1.jpg password: 8d969eef6ecad3c29a3a629280e686cf0c3f5d5a86aff3ca12020c923adc6c92 toc: false mathjax: false summary: categories: Markdown tags: - Typora - Markdown --- ``` ## ![](http://static.blinkfox.com/matery-20181202-1.png) ![](http://static.blinkfox.com/matery-20181202-2.png) ![](http://static.blinkfox.com/matery-20181202-3.png) ![](http://static.blinkfox.com/matery-20181202-7.png) ![](http://static.blinkfox.com/matery-20181202-8.png) ## `_config.yml` - - - - - `favicon` `Logo` - - TOC - - - MathJax - - '' - - - - `Gitalk``Gitment``Valine` `disqus` - [](http://busuanzi.ibruce.info/)`Google Analytics` - `hashcode` **** `_config.yml` ### `/source/css/matery.css` `.bg-color` ```css /* . */ .bg-color { background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #4cbf30 0%, #0f9d58 100%); } @-webkit-keyframes rainbow { /* . */ } @keyframes rainbow { /* . */ } ``` ### banner `/source/medias/banner` `banner` `7` `JavaScript` `banner` `/layout/_partial/bg-cover-content.ejs` `` ```javascript $('.bg-cover').css('background-image', 'url(/medias/banner/' + new Date().getDay() + '.jpg)'); ``` `/source/medias/featureimages` 24 `_config.yml`
Post.content:
Hexo 5.0.0 Hexo Hexo

master hexo-theme-matery Hexo themes

themes git clone :

git clone https://github.com/blinkfox/hexo-theme-matery.git

(_config.yml_config.yml)

Hexo _config.yml theme theme: hexo-theme-matery

_config.yml :

  • _config.yml url URLhttp://lqs-1.github.io
  • _config.yml per_page 6 1218
  • _config.yml language zh-CN

categories

categories source categories/index.md 

hexo new page "categories"

/source/categories/index.md

---
title: categories
date: 2018-09-30 17:25:30
type: "categories"
layout: "categories"
---

tags

tags source tags/index.md 

hexo new page "tags"

/source/tags/index.md

---
title: tags
date: 2018-09-30 18:23:38
type: "tags"
layout: "tags"
---

404

source 404.md 

touch 404.md

/source/404/index.md

---
title: 404
date: 2018-09-30 17:25:30
type: "404"
layout: "404"
description: "Oops :("
---

urlicon.

1.(Index)
2.icon Font Awesome 

menu:
  Index:
    url: /
    icon: fas fa-home
  Tags:
    url: /tags
    icon: fas fa-tags
  Categories:
    url: /categories
    icon: fas fa-bookmark
  Archives:
    url: /archives
    icon: fas fa-archive

  1. children(:Aboutchildren)
  2. children name,urlicon.
  3. -. 
menu:
  Index:
    url: /
    icon: fas fa-home
  Tags:
    url: /tags
    icon: fas fa-tags
  Categories:
    url: /categories
    icon: fas fa-bookmark
  Archives:
    url: /archives
    icon: fas fa-archive
  About:
    url: /about
    icon: fas fa-user-circle-o
  Friends:
    url: /friends
    icon: fas fa-address-book
  Medias:
    icon: fas fa-list
    children:
      - name: Music
        url: /music
        icon: fas fa-music
      - name: Movies
        url: /movies
        icon: fas fa-film
      - name: Books
        url: /books
        icon: fas fa-book
      - name: Galleries
        url: /galleries
        icon: fas fa-image

hexo clean && hexo g emoji

Hexo5.0 prismjs

hexo-prism-plugin npm uninstall hexo-prism-plugin { }

Hexo _config.yml highlight.enable false prismjs.enable true

highlight:
  enable: false
  line_number: true
  auto_detect: false
  tab_replace: ''
  wrap: true
  hljs: false
prismjs:
  enable: true
  preprocess: true
  line_number: true
  tab_replace: ''

prismjs Tomorrow Night prismjs css css prism.css hexo-theme-matery source/libs/prism/prism.css

hexo-generator-search Hexo 

npm install hexo-generator-search --save

Hexo _config.yml 

search:
  path: search.xml
  field: post

Hexo SEO gitment hexo-permalink-pinyin Hexo 

npm i hexo-permalink-pinyin --save

Hexo _config.yml 

permalink_pinyin:
  enable: true
  separator: '-' # default: '-'

hexo-abbrlink

hexo-wordcount

npm i --save hexo-wordcount

_config.yml 

postInfo:
  date: true
  update: false
  wordCount: false #  true.
  totalCount: false #  true.
  min2read: false # .
  readCount: false # .

_config.yml QQGitHub

BGM

<div align="middle"></div>

source/medias/reward

Front-matter

Front-matter

Front-matter title date

title Markdown
date
author _config.yml author
img featureImages ().: http://xxx.com/xxx.jpg
top true top true
cover false v1.0.2
coverImg v1.0.2
password password SHA256 config.yml verifyPassword
toc true TOC TOC config.yml toc
mathjax false mathjax _config.yml
summary
categories
tags
keywords SEO
reprintPolicy cc_by cc_by, cc_by_nd, cc_by_sa, cc_by_nc, cc_by_nc_nd, cc_by_nc_sa, cc0, noreprint pay

:

  1. img hashcode
  2. date Gitalk Gitment id date
  3. Front-matter SHA256 password _config.yml SHA256 chahuo
  4. md front-matter reprintPolicy

Front-matter 

---
title: typora-vue-theme
date: 2018-09-07 09:25:00
---

---
title: typora-vue-theme
date: 2018-09-07 09:25:00
author: 
img: /source/images/xxx.jpg
top: true
cover: true
coverImg: /images/1.jpg
password: 8d969eef6ecad3c29a3a629280e686cf0c3f5d5a86aff3ca12020c923adc6c92
toc: false
mathjax: false
summary: 
categories: Markdown
tags:
  - Typora
  - Markdown
---

_config.yml

  • favicon Logo
  • TOC
  • MathJax
  • GitalkGitmentValine disqus
  • Google Analytics
  • hashcode

_config.yml

/source/css/matery.css .bg-color 

/* . */
.bg-color {
    background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #4cbf30 0%, #0f9d58 100%);
}

@-webkit-keyframes rainbow {
   /* . */
}

@keyframes rainbow {
    /* . */
}

banner

/source/medias/banner banner 7 JavaScript banner /layout/_partial/bg-cover-content.ejs <script></script> 

$('.bg-cover').css('background-image', 'url(/medias/banner/' + new Date().getDay() + '.jpg)');

/source/medias/featureimages 24 _config.yml
